name: Crystal Master
text: You can Tribute this card; add 1 "Rainbow Dragon", 1 "Rainbow Dark Dragon", 1 "Crystal Beast" monster, or 1 "Crystal" Spell/Trap Card (except "Crystal Counter" or "Violet Crystal") from your Deck to your hand.
pendulum_text: Your opponent cannot target "Crystal Beast" cards, "Rainbow Dragon", and "Rainbow Dark Dragon" you control with card effects.
